page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This area includes the southern half of the town of Bridport with its important shopping centre which serves most of West Dorset. The A35 trunk road, one of the main holiday routes to Devon and Cornwall, passes through the centre of the town. To the south of the old compact centre of the town there are new housing estates at Skilling, Bothenhampton and Wanderswell to cater for the rising population of the area. Two miles to the south of Bridport is the small holiday resort of West Bay centred on the old Bridport Harbour which is at the western end of Chesil Beach. To the east is the vertical East Cliff of yellow sandstone while to the west are the landslip cliffs of West Cliff and Thorncombe Beacon.
